subject: PSYCH
title: Directed Studies - Seminar
description: The student conducts an extensive literature review under the supervision of a faculty member. Course requirements include writing a major essay/critique of the literature, and doing an oral presentation. The course application form must include a detailed course plan including the method of evaluation. [Note: Normally students will take no more than three of PSYCH 480-486. Offered: F,W,S]
